title: Recieved Riot Kayle but haven't received the Poro Icon
body:
So im not sure if its givin out this week or if its something else ive recieved riot kayle but i havent recieved the poro icon along with it
Icons i currently have:http://imgur.com/gallery/wLFY4
And heres my ownership of riot kayle skin:http://imgur.com/a/Ar4Wy

replies.body: All of the gifts are being sent separately, so you may not get everything at once per our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  There's a lot of accounts being gifted so it will take some time.  Patience!
alright ty for the taking time to help me out and answer my question {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
